casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Robert PARISI 65A17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 6, 2018 John W. Congleton, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michele A. Goldman, Attorney at Law, Boston, MA, for Parisi, Jeffrey Robert.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of August 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of August 2018."
